Articles.Content:
Hi Everyone

Well I\'ve finally managed to get account (for some reason signing up with my hotmail address would just send a \'Account requires activation by an admin\' message and then gets deleted the next day, finally got around it with a different address which then didn\'t require activation?!?)

Just a quick question: I\'ve been designing a kind of \'Ultimate KSP\' (on paper) based on my own thoughts with inspiration from the various mods I\'ve seen here, mostly as kind of my fantasy of what this game could be. I\'ve got all the details thought out and wanted to post it up just to discuss with like-minded people (none of my friends are really into KSP...yet). It\'s not really suggestions, or a feature request as a lot is covered by mods, planned features etc, just me wanting to ramble with people who will \'get it\' - can anyone suggest which forum would be best to start such a rant?

Anyway, i\'m really looking forward to where this game is going, particularly the effort of the modders!

Osiris

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Sorry you had trouble signing up for a forum account. The entries don\'t get cleared for 7 days, so I\'m not sure what could of happened.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

I may of course be wrong, but I personally think it\'d go in the \'General Discussion\' sub-forum, considering this is about KSP. I have got the link for you here: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?board=31.0

Also, welcome to KSP!

Thanks guys.

The registration seemed to be related purely to my email address, I\'ve seen some forums in the past treat 'free' (i.e. hotmail, gmail) addresses differently to keep the bots out.

I\'ve got some free time at the weekend so I will try and do some debugging then and see if I can isolate what\'s causing it and then pass on to the admins

Thanks for the warm welcome

Cheers
